short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect Amazon links to Amazon Smile links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whenever you go to an Amazon.com link, Always Smile will always make sure your link is redirected to smile.amazon.com to ensure your a small portion of your purchase will go to a charity of your choice.
